title: Indigenous Voters Mobilize in Midterm Elections
description: Having swayed a presidential election and increased their representation in Congress, Indigenous voters are poised to help decide the outcome of the midterm elections.
dc:creator: Emily Cochrane and Mark Walker
media:credit: Brian Adams for The New York Times
media:description: Ryen Aavurauq Richards said she believed her vote mattered more in recent years, after watching Indigenous voters come together to advocate for issues impacting their ways of life.
